meanings.definition: The act or process of making something denser or more compact.
meanings.sent1: The densifications of the soil improved its stability.
meanings.sent2: The densifications of the books on the shelf made more space available.
meanings.sent3: The densifications of the clouds made them look like fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: The densifications of the crowd in the stadium created a buzzing energy.
meanings.sent5: The densifications of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious cake.

meanings.definition: The state of being denser or more compact.
meanings.sent1: The densifications of the material made it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The densifications of the city led to taller buildings.
meanings.sent3: The densifications of the traffic made the commute more challenging.
meanings.sent4: The densifications of the forest created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The densifications of the stars in the sky made them shine brighter.
